General.Name: ZiftrCoin
General.Description: ziftrCOIN (ZRC) is a decentralised, open-source cryptocurrency forked from Bitcoin and launched in February 2015. It is developed by Ziftr, a US-based company that offers various e-commerce solutions, such as a browser add-on and mobile applications. The company's goal is to enable consumers to conduct simple, secure transactions, using ziftrCOINs (as well as several other cryptocurrencies), at their favorite retailers.

ICO.Description: Prior to formal launch, ziftrCOINs were offered to consumers in a pre-sale which generated over US$850,000 for the company; these funds were used to fund the development of a suite of tools for merchants in the Ziftr ecosystem, including a merchant API (Ziftrpay), a dedicated digital wallet (Ziftrwallet) and an online marketplace for the altcoins (Ziftrshop).
